name: The witch with pain
description:
The witch with pain is a Top Down puzzle game.

You play as Wise. The beloved witch who's accidentally trapped in a dungeon. She must find her way out to her beloved villagers. They are expecting her to be in the village! Wise is a witch that gain power through pain and suffering.

Controls
Arrows key or U,H,J,K : To move   
: To attack
Hold : To sprint   
: To go back to main menu during levels
: To Reset

[Note : You can't attack while sprinting , Attacking will reduce 16% of Mana]

Obstacle and Items
Magma : Once stepped on will reduce your health by one. Will continued if stepping.
Cursed Magma : Once stepped on will make Wise become cursed. Once cursed health will be reduced by 1 every seconds. [This applied for the entire level] [More steps mean more cursed]
Barrier : Will block the player. In order to get past you must break them by attacking them [Press Z to attack]
Heal up : Once collected. Recover player's health by one. Will not recover if the player's health is already full.

Additional gameplay's info

  • Wise(The player) Has 6 health and 6 Mana displayed in percentage.
  • Wise(The player) can get hit 6 times
  • If Wise get hit. Wise gain 16% mana. or Gain a chance of attacking.
  • NO YOU CAN'T ATTACK WHILE SPRINTING THAT'S TOO OP.
